Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: I purchased one unit from amazon that worked flawlessly about a year ago.I purchased two more about a month ago and neither would "Flash" rendering them useless.Amazon was great about the return, however it left me stranded as I could not find this item anywhere else.If it works, it works.If it doesn't flash, its a paper-weight.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Sra. J
Reviews.Content: Not a lot to say. Plug an antenna in to this, plug this into a bypass module (like a dball or xk module), and plug the module into the vehicle. Simple, easy, done. Would recommend to anyone who wants to add keyless entry/remote start to a newer vehicle.

ProductInfo.Features:
RF To Data Interface module compatible with Directed 5 volt LE & SST transceiver (IVU). The 2-way RFTD module acts like a hub to add long range 1-way or 2-way remote control to any "Remote Start Ready" XPRESSKIT applications.
Compatible with Directed 5 volt LE & SST transceiver
Plugs directly into XpressKit CANMAX400 or DLPKKICH3
XL202 is compatible with Viper, Clifford and Python HHU & IVU kits
ProductInfo.Name: Directed Electronics Inc XL202 RF to Data Interface
